descripcion: Managing ticket workload across a number of customers, escalating issues where appropriate and providing resolution to issues • Liaising with internal Customer Managers, Service Desk, Incident and Problem Managers and Change Managers, whilst being involved in the management of major incidents and performance reporting • Troubleshooting issues in the product (application and data), database server, web server (IIS), and networks, to minimize risk of disruptions • Communicating and escalating critical service failures through the Incident Management, Problem Management and Senior Management teams • Ensuring reviews are fully documented and actions are raised and fulfilled • Being involved in changes to the service operation tools, processes and working practices • Assisting in defining and meeting SLAs, OLAs and maintenance, as well as updates of the service catalogue • Assisting in building up the Services Support Knowledgebase and promoting more 1st- line support resolution by JIRA Service Desk • Undertaking continuous improvement in the operation • Coordinating with Delivery (Product Development) and Implementation teams to support product updates • Supporting updates to products and services in both test and live system environments, in compliance with defined procedures • Creating Microsoft SQL Server and Oracle Databases scripts to identify and correct data integrity issues in customer's data • Identifying opportunities that can improve efficiency of business and technical processes • Including all other duties as may arise from time to time and as may be assigned
requisitos: A Bachelor`s degree in IT or Computer Science with 2+ years experience with web-based applications that have used SQL Server and/or Oracle databases.

descripcion: Programador para desarrollo y mantenimiento de aplicación web.

descripcion: Programador para aplicaciones móviles híbridas con las siguientes características: - Fuertes conocimientos en Flutter - Fuertes conocimientos en PHP - Fuerte conocimiento de HTML y JavaScript - Conocimiento en base de datos MySQL - Conocimiento en control de versiones GIT

Job description We are looking for a full-stack developer that would be able to analyze, design, and develop new applications or update existing ones, always in accordance with the requirements of the project or task assigned, ensuring high performance and responsiveness. Responsibilities: Good English level. Build efficient, testable, and reusable PHP and/or C# code. Solve complex performance problems and architectural challenges. Integrate elements that may be developed by other members of the team. Design and integrate data storage solutions, like databases, key-value stores, etc. Follow industry best practices. Skills and qualifications: BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related subject. Understanding fundamental design principles behind a scalable application. Writing clean, fast PHP, and/or C# to a high standard. Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes. Strong knowledge of SQL database integration (SQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL). Knowledge of PHP frameworks, such as Laravel, CodeIgniter, Symphony. Knowledge of .NET technologies, such as LINQ, Entity Framework, Identity, ASP.NET (webAPI, and MVC). Experience in object-oriented programming. Knowledge of versioning tools such as Git. Understanding of MVC architecture. Strong knowledge of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. Experience using third-party APIs. Experience working with Angular v4 or above. Basic experience using SQL Server and Windows Server. Excellent verbal, interpersonal, and written communication skills. Strong analytical, problem-solving skills.
